titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of September 29, 2024, as "Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States Day".
A concurrent resolution expressing support for the designation of September 29, 2024, as "Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and an amended preamble by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution expresses support for the designation of September 29, 2024, as Veterans of Foreign Wars of the United States Day and recognizes the historic significance of the 125th anniversary of the founding of the organization.
